item.title: Pete Hegseth, not Mark Kelly, should be facing justice
item.description: There’s a reason lawmakers worry about the military being told to ignore the law.

item.title: I’m an air safety expert. U.S. air traffic control needs a system overhaul.
item.description: Readers respond to Post articles and commentary.

item.title: Who are we for? I answered your questions.
item.description: David’s live chat with readers started at 12 p.m. ET on Monday. Read the transcript.

item.title: Is D.C. ready for a Mamdani-style candidate?
item.description: Washington Mayor Muriel Bowser’s announcement was quiet. The campaign to replace her won’t be.

item.title: Who could shield Taiwan from China? A new answer is emerging.
item.description: The island is making leaps in military spending and acting with greater focus than ever before.

item.title: New York won’t reign forever. Bring on Y’all Street.
item.description: As Dallas gets a Nasdaq exchange, Texas looks more like America’s financial center.

item.title: America’s veterans deserve better care than government unions provide
item.description: President Franklin D. Roosevelt understood the folly of collective bargaining at Veterans Affairs.

item.title: Here you go, Republicans: Alternatives for health care reform
item.description: The GOP should advance proposals that put patients back in charge of our health care system.

item.title: The best and brightest scientists won’t put up with this
item.description: The assumption that top researchers will endure any visa hardship to stay in the U.S. is obsolete.

item.title: Baby boomers have hollowed out America
item.description: Debt, inflation, defense spending, wealth and the penny, through readers’ eyes.

item.title: Switzerland just chose its economy over a wealth tax. America, take note.
item.description: Voters overwhelmingly reject populism in defense of their country’s economic interests.

item.title: The tech fix that can clear the Western range of its barbed wire
item.description: GPS-based virtual fences clear migration corridors for wildlife while cutting costs for ranchers.

item.title: Georgia’s prosecutor drops a Trump case. If only Garland had done the same.
item.description: Special counsel Jack Smith’s pursuit of Trump backfired. Now comes a Georgia lesson in wise restraint.
